title: Linux testparm Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux testparm command, which verifies the syntax of Samba configuration files and analyzes Samba parameters. Learn practical examples to effectively manage and troubleshoot your Samba setup.

meta.title: Linux testparm Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux testparm command, which verifies the syntax of Samba configuration files and analyzes Samba parameters. Learn practical examples to effectively manage and troubleshoot your Samba setup.
meta.keywords: Linux, Samba, testparm, configuration, network, troubleshooting, system administration

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of testparm Command

verify.name: Verify testparm command version
verify.hint: The testparm command version should be 4.15.5-Debian.

verify.name: Verify Samba configuration file syntax
verify.hint: The testparm command should report that the Samba configuration file is loaded successfully.

steps.title: Analyze Samba Configuration Parameters with testparm

verify.name: Verify Samba configuration parameter analysis
verify.hint: The testparm command should show that the 'log file' parameter is set to '/var/log/samba/log.%m'.
